item.title: v0.1 October 5, 2014
item.description: • Initial version as preview for railway mappers

item.title: v0.2 October 18, 2014
item.description:
• Better error handling
  • Additional trains and generic trains
  • Support of maxspeed in mph
  • New About page
  • Minor tweaks and bugfixes

item.title: v0.3 January 23, 2015
item.description:
• Search for routes by number, operator, network, origin and destination
  • Additional trains
  • Support of stop nodes that are not directly on the way of the route
  • Minor tweaks and bugfixes
